REPORT ON STANDARDIZATION OF MEASURES RELATED TO DIGITAL INFORMATION. The Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology will report to congressional committees on informatics efforts, standards harmonization, research, and support for digitization. The report will include timetables for information standards promulgation and major challenges. The National Institute of Standards and Technology will report to congressional committees on informatics standards development, digitization efforts, and timetables for information standards promulgation. The report will address challenges in reaching standards promulgation, ensuring digital information usability, and actions to ensure robust and timely standards.
